13  package net.sf.oval.test.constraints;
14  
15  import junit.framework.TestCase;
16  import net.sf.oval.Check;
17  import net.sf.oval.Validator;
18  
19  /**
20   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
21   */
22  public abstract class AbstractContraintsTest extends TestCase
23  {
24  	protected final Validator validator = new Validator();
25  
26  	/**
27  	 * Performs basic tests of the check implementation.
28  	 * @param check
29  	 */
30  	protected void testCheck(final Check check)
31  	{
32  		check.setMessage("XYZ");
33  		assertEquals("XYZ", check.getMessage());
34  
35  		check.setProfiles("p1");
36  		assertNotNull(check.getProfiles());
37  		assertEquals(1, check.getProfiles().length);
38  		assertEquals("p1", check.getProfiles()[0]);
39  
40  		check.setProfiles((String[]) null);
41  		assertTrue(check.getProfiles() == null || check.getProfiles().length == 0);
42  	}
43  }
